segments.text: Can you tell me the results of my home inspection ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Before I answer that , I want to make sure that you know what I was looking for . Are you clear on what I was looking for ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I never had a home inspection before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I inspect the home for problems that might not be all that apparent in a quick walk-through .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I asked the owners , and they said that everything was great with the house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The owners might not be aware of everything wrong with the house . Some things are hidden , but might still be a problem for you in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard that the owners must fix all of the problems before the escrow closes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I inform you of the problems . If there are major problems , you can decline to buy the house or they may wish to fix any problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of things did you discover in my home inspection ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I found some fairly major problems . A major support beam in the roof is broken , and the shower floor leaked and rotted out the second-floor joist .
segments.speaker: S2
